remarks: Inter-alia, to consider 1. Issuance of Rated, Listed, Unsecured, Redeemable, Non-Convertible Debentures on a private placement basis aggregating upto Rs 500 crore.
Inter-alia, to consider 1. Issuance of Rated, Listed, Unsecured, Redeemable, Non-Convertible Debentures on a private placement basis aggregating upto Rs 2,000 crore.
The Board in the said Meeting would also consider a proposal for raising funds by way of issue of one or more instruments.
